General.Name: Denarius Silver Corp
General.Description: Denarius Metals Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and operation of mining properties in Spain and Colombia. The company explores for gold, silver, copper, lead, and zinc deposits. It holds a 100% interest in the Lomero project that comprises 454 hectares located in the Huelva, southern Spain; the Guia Antigua project covering an area of 386 hectares located in northeast of Medellin in the Segovia-Remedios mining district, Colombia; and the Zancudo project located in the municipality of Titiribi, Colombia. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 401 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 2Y4
